LanguageData.ClickToJumpToProblem: Klik her for at springe til problemet.
LanguageData.BreakRiskMinorDesc: These colonists are in a poor mood and may have a minor mental break at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.BreakRiskMajorDesc: These colonists are in a very poor mood and may have a major mental break at any time:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.BreakRiskExtremeDesc: These colonists are critically stressed and may have an extreme (and possibly violent) mental break at any moment:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.BreakRiskDescEnding: Check these colonists' Needs tab to see what's bothering them.\n\nTo make colonists feel better, you can do things like make them fancy meals, give them more recreation hours per day and nicer recreation objects, place them in beautiful environments, have them drink and smoke, and much more.
LanguageData.ColonistsNeedRescueDesc:
These colonists are incapacitated on the ground:

{0}
Send another colonist to rescue them and carry them back to bed.

(To rescue, select another colonist, then right click on the victim and select Rescue.
LanguageData.NeedDefensesDesc: You've been here some time and have probably been seen. Pirate raids will start soon.\n\nYou should prepare defenses, like sandbags or traps.
LanguageData.NeedMinerDesc: You have designated some rocks to be mined, but no colonist has the Mining work type.\n\nAssign a colonist the Mining work type.
LanguageData.NeedWardenDesc: You have a prisoner, but no colonist has the Warden work type.\n\nAssign a colonist the Warden work type.
LanguageData.LowMedicineDesc: Du har kun {0} medicin tilbage på lageret.\n\nKøb mere medicin fra handelsmænd.
LanguageData.NoMedicineDesc: Du har ingen medicin tilbage på lageret.\n\nKøb mere medicin fra handelsmænd.
LanguageData.NeedColonistBedsDesc:
Du har flere kolonister end der er kolonistsenge. Nogen vil mangle et sted at sove.

Enten byg flere senge eller skift en fangeseng til en kolonistseng.

If you have no resources, sleeping spots are free and can be placed instantly.
LanguageData.HunterLacksWeaponDesc: A colonist is assigned as a hunter but does not have a ranged weapon.\n\nThey will not hunt until they are carrying a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.AlertTatteredApparelDesc:
These colonists are wearing tattered apparel, which is making them sad:

{0}
Get them some apparel that isn't so badly damaged.

Du kan sy beklædninger ved et tailoring table eller købe det fra handelsmænd.
LanguageData.AlertUnhappyNudityDesc:
Disse kolonister er nøgne og er ikke glade for det:

{0}
Skaf dem noget tøj.

Du kan sy beklædninger ved et tailoring table eller købe det fra handelsmænd.
LanguageData.NeedFoodHopperDesc:
You have a nutrient dispenser with no hopper next to it.

To work, paste dispensers must draw from an adjacent hopper filled with raw food.

Build a hopper adjacent to the dispenser.
LanguageData.NeedMealSourceDesc:
You have no way of preparing proper meals from raw food.

Build a stove, campfire, or nutrient dispenser.

(It cannot be in a prison cell, otherwise colonists cannot use it.)
LanguageData.CurrentExpectationsAndRecreation: At current expectations ({0}), each tolerance falls by {1} per day awake. Having {2} recreation types is recommended.
LanguageData.NeedBatteriesDesc: You have a solar or wind generator, but no batteries. This means you'll lose power every time the sun goes down or the wind calms.\n\nBuild a battery or two to guarantee sustained power.
LanguageData.BrawlerHasRangedWeaponDesc: One of your colonists has the Brawler personality trait, but is carrying a ranged weapon. This will make them very unhappy.
LanguageData.ShieldUserHasRangedWeaponDesc: One of your colonists has a shield belt and is carrying a ranged weapon. They will not be able to fire their weapon through the shield (except at targets who are already touching them).
LanguageData.NeedResearchProjectDesc: You have the equipment to do research but have not selected a project.\n\nOpen the research menu and select a project.
LanguageData.ColonistNeedsTreatmentDesc:
These colonists need medical treatment. Without it, they may die of their wounds, or their wounds may become permanent.

{0}
Treat them by sending them to a medical bed.

(First, assign a medical bed by selecting it and toggling it into a medical bed. Then, select the wounded colonists and right-click on the medical bed to make them a patient.)
LanguageData.BilliardsNeedsSpaceDesc: One of your billiards table is adjacent to an obstruction that will prevent colonists from using it.\n\nA billiards table needs clear space around it on all sides to be usable.
LanguageData.HunterHasShieldAndRangedWeapon: Hunter has shield and ranged weapon
LanguageData.HunterHasShieldAndRangedWeaponDesc: One of your hunters is using a ranged weapon and wearing a shield belt which prevents shooting at range.\n\nThey won't be able to hunt unless the shield is removed.
LanguageData.NeedWarmClothesDesc1: Mindst {0} af dine kolonister kommer til at mangle varmt tøj når den kolde sæson begynder.
LanguageData.NeedWarmClothesDesc1All: Alle dine kolonister kommer til at mange varmt tøj når den kolde sæson begynder.
LanguageData.NeedWarmClothesDesc2: The outdoor temperature is going to reach {0}.\n\nDu kan sy varmt tøj ved en sybænk (tailoring bench*) eller du kan købe dem fra handelsmænd.
LanguageData.ImmobileCaravanDesc: En af dine karavaner er immobil, fordi den bærer på for meget.\n\nDu kan gøre karavanen mobil igen ved at give afkald på nogle af genstandene i fanen GENSTANDE.
